text.more:
Social Network Analysis of 388 Math for America teachers, who named other teachers who influenced their pedagogy.

Nodes are colored by subject (red = mathematics, blue = science, green = computer science)

Edges are colored by whether they were within the same school or across schools (black = within school, purple = across school)

Edges across schools are more interesting for analysis, as they contribute to the mission of Math for America to create a community of teachers across schools within NYC.

text.title: Survey Results Between Teachers
